statements: SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customers WHERE city = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, state FROM customers WHERE city = 'Chicago';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC
SELECT first_name, email FROM customers WHERE city = 'New York'
SELECT customer_id, first_name FROM customers WHERE state = 'California' ORDER BY first_name
SELECT last_name, email FROM customers WHERE city = 'Los Angeles' AND state = 'California'
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE city = 'Miami' AND state = 'Florida' ORDER BY customer_id DESC
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(campaign_id) AS num_campaigns FROM Campaigns GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM Customers ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, Customers.first_name, Customers.last_name FROM Campaigns JOIN Customers ON Campaigns.customer_id = Customers.customer_id;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Customers WHERE last_name LIKE '%son%' ORDER BY first_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM campaign_customers ORDER BY campaign_id DESC, id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE first_name = 'John'
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY last_name DESC
SELECT c.customer_id, c.first_name, c.last_name, cm.campaign_name FROM customers c JOIN campaign_customers cc ON c.customer_id = cc.customer_id JOIN campaigns cm ON cc.campaign_id = cm.campaign_id
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT first_name, last_name, order_date FROM customers INNER JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id;
SELECT order_id, total_amount, start_date, end_date FROM orders INNER JOIN campaigns ON orders.order_id = campaigns.campaign_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, count(product_id) AS purchase_count FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id HAVING purchase_count > 3;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, purchase_date FROM purchases WHERE quantity > 5;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, description FROM campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, campaign_id, sent_date, opened, clicked FROM email_logs WHERE opened = TRUE;
